name: Helicopters - coloring book
description: With this application you have a new look at the usual coloring books. Painting the helicopters, you can see it in an actual combat. We also worked with sound effects picked up the unique sound of the engine and propeller noise for each helicopter. A diverse set of animation and sound effects on the new Retina screen allows you to get acquainted with the military equipment and see it in the action. For those who want to paint the picture with paints and pencils, we have made it possible to print images from iPad on your printer by using Air Print. The following applications are in plans: Aircrafts and Ships. Collect collection of all coloring books. Watch for the release of new applications on our website.
